mapper.insert: insert into memojang(MEMO_NO, MEM_NO, MEM_EMAIL, MEMO_NAME, MEMO_TITLE, MEMO_CONTENTS, MEMO_WRITEDATE, MEMO_HITS, MEMO_OPEN) values(memojang_seq.nextval, #{mem_no}, #{username}, #{memo_name}, #{memo_title}, #{memo_contents}, sysdate, 0, #{memo_open})
mapper.select: select m.MEMO_NO, m.MEM_NO, m.MEM_EMAIL as username, m.MEMO_NAME, m.MEMO_TITLE, m.MEMO_CONTENTS, m.MEMO_WRITEDATE, m.MEMO_HITS, m.MEMO_OPEN, k.book_likecheck from memojang m full outer join bookmark k on (m.memo_no = k.memo_no) where m.MEMO_NO = #{memo_no}

select MEMO_NO, MEM_NO, MEM_EMAIL as username, MEMO_NAME, MEMO_TITLE, MEMO_CONTENTS, MEMO_WRITEDATE, MEMO_HITS, MEMO_OPEN from memojang where MEM_NO=#{MEM_NO} order by MEMO_NO desc, MEMO_WRITEDATE desc
mapper.insert: insert into image(IMAGE_NO, MEMO_NO, MEM_NO, IMAGE_NAME) values (memojang_seq.nextval, #{memo_no}, #{mem_no}, #{image_name})
insert into image(IMAGE_NO, MEMO_NO, MEM_NO, IMAGE_NAME) values (memojang_seq.nextval, #{memo_no}, #{mem_no}, #{image_name})
mapper.select: SELECT a.MEMO_NO, a.mem_no, a.MEMO_NAME, a.MEMO_TITLE, a.MEMO_CONTENTS, a.MEMO_WRITEDATE, a.MEMO_HITS, a.MEMO_OPEN FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, b.MEMO_NO, b.MEM_NO, b.MEMO_NAME, b.MEMO_TITLE, b.MEMO_CONTENTS, b.MEMO_WRITEDATE, b.MEMO_HITS, b.MEMO_OPEN FROM (SELECT MEMO_NO, MEM_NO, MEMO_NAME, MEMO_TITLE, MEMO_CONTENTS, MEMO_WRITEDATE, MEMO_HITS, MEMO_OPEN from memojang where MEM_NO=#{mem_no} and MEMO_NO > 0 order by MEMO_NO desc, MEMO_WRITEDATE desc ) b) a where rn between #{startIndex} and #{endIndex}
select count(MEMO_NO) from memojang where MEMO_NO > 0
mapper.insert: insert into bookmark(BOOK_NO, MEMO_NO, MEM_NO, BOOK_LIKECHECK) values(bookmark_seq.nextval, #{memo_no}, #{mem_no}, 1)
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where memo_no=#{memo_no} and MEM_NO=#{mem_no}
mapper.select: SELECT a.MEMO_NO, a.mem_no, a.MEMO_NAME, a.MEMO_TITLE, a.MEMO_CONTENTS, a.MEMO_WRITEDATE, a.MEMO_HITS, a.MEMO_OPEN FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, b.MEMO_NO, b.MEM_NO, b.MEMO_NAME, b.MEMO_TITLE, b.MEMO_CONTENTS, b.MEMO_WRITEDATE, b.MEMO_HITS, b.MEMO_OPEN FROM (SELECT m.MEMO_NO, m.MEM_NO, m.MEMO_NAME, m.MEMO_TITLE, m.MEMO_CONTENTS, m.MEMO_WRITEDATE, m.MEMO_HITS, m.MEMO_OPEN, k.book_no, k.BOOK_LIKECHECK from memojang m join bookmark k on (m.MEMO_NO = k.MEMO_NO) where m.MEM_NO=#{mem_no} and m.MEMO_NO > 0 and k.book_no > 0 and k.BOOK_LIKECHECK > 0 order by m.MEMO_NO desc, m.MEMO_WRITEDATE desc ) b) a where rn between #{startIndex} and #{endIndex}
select count(book_no) from bookmark where book_no > 0

SELECT a.MEMO_NO, a.mem_no, a.MEMO_NAME, a.MEMO_TITLE, a.MEMO_CONTENTS, a.MEMO_WRITEDATE, a.MEMO_HITS, a.MEMO_OPEN FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, b.MEMO_NO, b.MEM_NO, b.MEMO_NAME, b.MEMO_TITLE, b.MEMO_CONTENTS, b.MEMO_WRITEDATE, b.MEMO_HITS, b.MEMO_OPEN FROM (SELECT m.MEMO_NO, m.MEM_NO, m.MEMO_NAME, m.MEMO_TITLE, m.MEMO_CONTENTS, m.MEMO_WRITEDATE, m.MEMO_HITS, m.MEMO_OPEN, k.book_no, k.BOOK_LIKECHECK from memojang m join bookmark k on (m.MEMO_NO = k.MEMO_NO) where m.MEMO_NO > 0 and m.MEMO_OPEN = 0 and k.book_no > 0 and k.BOOK_LIKECHECK > 0 order by m.MEMO_NO desc, m.MEMO_WRITEDATE desc ) b) a where rn between #{startIndex} and #{endIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "count", TO_CHAR(MEMO_WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS memo_writedate FROM memojang WHERE mem_no=#{mem_no} and MEMO_WRITEDATE BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(MEMO_WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') order by MEMO_WRITEDATE
SELECT memo_title, count(*) AS "mount" FROM memojang where mem_no=#{mem_no} GROUP BY memo_title HAVING count(*) > 1
